long_description: The 2.5x power Carson MagniSlide(TM) Magnifier is small enough to fit in your wallet and light enough to carry all the time so you can read the small type on menus and maps. 2.5x magnification makes it easy to read small type. Includes a protective case. Closeout.
short_description: The 2.5x power Carson MagniSlide(TM) Magnifier is small enough to fit in your wallet and light enough to carry all the time so you can read the small type on menus and maps.
